Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan scored 89 off 56 balls, with 10 fours and 3 sixes, and was awarded the Player of the Match and CRICINFO's MVP.
Rohit Sharma scored 44 off 32 balls, with 2 fours and 1 six.
Shreyas Iyer scored 57 off 28 balls, with 5 fours and 2 sixes, and reached 50 off 25 balls.
Dinesh Chandimal was stumped by Ishan Kishan off Ravindra Jadeja for 10 runs.
Dasun Shanaka was caught by Bhuvneshwar Kumar off Yuzvendra Chahal for 3 runs.
Chamika Karunaratne was caught by Ishan Kishan off Venkatesh Iyer for 21 runs.
Pathum Nissanka was bowled by Bhuvneshwar Kumar for 0 runs.
Kamil Mishara was caught by Rohit Sharma off Bhuvneshwar Kumar for 13 runs.
Janith Liyanage was caught by Sanju Samson off Venkatesh Iyer for 11 runs.
Charith Asalanka was not out with 53 runs off 47 balls, with 5 fours.
Dushmantha Chameera was not out with 24 runs off 14 balls, with 2 fours and 1 six.
India won the match by 62 runs, with a score of 199/2 in 20 overs.
Sri Lanka was bowled out for 137/6 in 20 overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Ishan Kishan expressed his gratitude for being awarded the Player of the Match and CRICINFO's MVP.
The match was part of the Sri Lanka tour of India, with India leading the 3-match series 1-0 after this win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's score of 199/2 in 20 overs was their highest in the series.
Sri Lanka's total of 137/6 in 20 overs was their lowest in the series.
The match was played at the Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow.
The match was a day-night match, played on February 24, 2022.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar made his debut in the series, and took 2 wickets for 9 runs in 2 overs.
Deepak Hooda made his T20I debut in the series.
